ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Backscatter data taken by the ceilometer at Kototabang (GIF format)
ResourceHeader.Description: The time-height plot of backscatter intensity in the troposphere (0-7 km) taken by the ceilometer at Kototabang, Indonesia (0.20S, 100.32E, 865m MSL). The black dots show primary cloud base. The right panel is a height profile of 1-day average backscatter intensity. File names are (year)(month)(day).gif. Local time (UT + 7h) is used for time data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If you acquire ceilometer data, we ask that you acknowledge us in your use of the data. This may be done by including text such as ceilometer data provided by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere of Kyoto University. We would also appreciate receiving a copy of the relevant publications.

DisplayData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Atmosphere Atmospheric Clouds Clouds Height

Parameter.Name: year
Parameter.Description: Year in the form YYYY where YYYY = Gregorian Year AD.

Parameter.Name: month
Parameter.Description: Month in the form MMM where MMM = month of year (Jan, Feb,..., Dec).

Parameter.Name: day
Parameter.Description: Day in the form DD where DD = day of month (01-31).

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Description: Time in the form hh where hh = hour of day (0-23). Local time (UT+07:00:00) is used for time data.

Parameter.Name: power
Parameter.Description: Backscatter echo intensity from haze, fog, mist, verge, precipitation and clouds. The unit of this parameter is unknown.

Parameter.Name: Average power
Parameter.Description: 1-day average backscatter echo intensity from haze, fog, mist, verge, precipitation and clouds. The unit of this parameter is unknown.
